USbank SQL

The following queries will reset loans when doing batch wire approvals
update GF_TLR_DISBURSEMENTS set S_FSTATUS = 'DTS_WREQ' where Datepart(Month,DATE_PROCESSED) = '12'
update USB_TLR_DISBURSEMENT set W_APPRVDBY1 = NULL where
Datepart(Month,W_APPRVDDT1) = '12'

where 12 is the current month.
